HeroSection.title:
Internxt, a **secure** 
Drime alternative
HeroSection.description:
Switch to Internxt for a fully private alternative to Drime. Post-quantum and 
 zero-knowledge encrypted cloud storage.

HeaderSection.title: Internxt vs Drime overview
HeaderSection.description: Discover the key features and differences that allow Internxt to give you back control over your data.

internxtFeatures: Competitive, no hidden costs, up to 5TB
Drive, VPN, Antivirus, Cleaner, Meet, Mail, and more
GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, SOC 2 compliant, based in Spain
competitorFeatures: Drive, file sharing, send & sign documents
Files stored outside the Drime Vault are less private

PrivacyViolationsSection.title: Drime lacks transparency. Internxt protects your privacy.
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: Drime keeps its source code hidden and has no published security audits. Only files in the Drime Vault are end-to-end encrypted. Switch to Internxt for full security and transparency for your files, videos, and photos. With Internxt, nobody but you can access your files, not even us.

descriptions: Drime keeps its source code hidden from the public. With no transparency or independent security audit, there is no way to know for sure how Drime handles or protects your data.
Unlike Internxt, Drime has not published any independent security audits, leaving users uncertain about the security of their platform.
Only files you manually move into the Drime Vault are encrypted end-to-end, while everything else in your regular cloud storage is still accessible to the provider through server-side encryption.

Drime focuses on cloud storage, collaboration, and document signing. With Internxt, our full product suite focuses on protecting and securing your data from Big Tech companies. With Antivirus, VPN, Cleaner, Meet, Mail, and more, Internxt combines post-quantum encryption with a comprehensive product suite.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Why you need a private Drime alternative
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: What Drime demonstrates in basic security fails in terms of complete privacy and transparency. For full privacy, get total security combined with zero-knowledge encryption for all your files from Internxt.

descriptions: Not all your files stored with Drime are protected with zero-knowledge encryption. Only files in the Drime Vault are encrypted end-to-end. At Internxt, all your files are protected with zero-knowledge encryption, with no trackers, no AI scanning, and no hidden backdoors. Your photos, documents, and videos remain private.

Drime requires you to manually move files into a separate vault for zero-knowledge encryption, while everything else uses server-side encryption. Internxt provides post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption for all files by default, ensuring your data is always protected.

Without open source code or audits, you can't be sure how Drime handles your data, if there are backdoors to your data, or if any security vulnerabilities exist. Internxt's code is open-source and regularly audited for complete transparency.

VersusSection.title: Internxt vs Drime
VersusSection.description: Internxt offers unparalleled security with features that Drime can't match, such as zero-knowledge encryption for all files, post-quantum encryption, and open-source transparency.

features.title: Open source
features.description: Internxt's code is open for everyone to examine and ensure its security via our GitHub. This transparency guarantees that no vulnerabilities are hidden.

features.title: Zero-knowledge encryption
features.description: Your data is encrypted on the client side, guaranteeing that only you can access it. All files are protected, not just those in a separate vault.

features.title: Audited & compliant
features.description: Internxt has been externally audited and complies with GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, and SOC 2.

features.title: Lifetime plans
features.description: Avoid repeated subscriptions with a one-time payment for plans up to 5TB. Access our services forever for {{percentage}}% off.

features.title: Closed source
features.description: Drime keeps its source code hidden from the public. With no transparency or independent security audit, there is no way to know for sure how Drime handles or protects your data.

features.title: Encrypted vault only
features.description: Zero-knowledge encryption is a separate storage option, leaving files stored outside the vault less secure and private with server-side encryption.

features.title: No published audits
features.description: Drime has not published any independent security audits, unlike Internxt which undergoes regular external audits.

features.title: Subscription and lifetime
features.description: Drime offers monthly, annual, and lifetime plans up to 6TB at higher prices than Internxt.

WhyBestAlternativeSection.title: Why Internxt is the best Drime alternative
WhyBestAlternativeSection.description: Internxt Drive offers a comprehensive suite of products designed to give you back control of your online privacy.

descriptions:
Internxt Drive comes with post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption, so nobody but you can access your files. Get encrypted cloud storage and backups for your photos, videos, and files. 

 Plus, encrypted backups and password-protected file sharing offer maximum protection against ransomware and data breaches.

Internxt Antivirus is built directly into your Internxt Drive app for full control and protection against malware. Run full or custom virus scans to keep your device running smoothly and protected against viruses such as ransomware or spyware.

Internxt's VPN protects your browsing, blocks ads and trackers, and keeps your location private. Encrypt your wifi connection to prevent spying, hackers, and identity theft. Surf securely knowing your personal information, passwords, and accounts are protected.

Internxt Cleaner helps you identify, eliminate, and manage unwanted junk or duplicate files from your device. With Cleaner, you can delete unwanted files to keep your storage organized, free from clutter, and ensure your device runs efficiently.

Internxt Meet is also available as your secure and private alternative to video conferencing. With Meet, you can host private video calls free from trackers, ads, and data collection. Your video calls are protected with post-quantum encryption, allowing you to host calls in total privacy.
Available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile. For advanced users, Internxt offers support for WebDAV, Rclone, and NAS, offering everything you need to manage your files in total privacy.

freePlanCard.description: Get 1GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure alternative to Drime?
answer: Yes, Internxt uses post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption that guarantees nobody but you can view your files. All your files are protected with this encryption, without the need to store them in a separate vault, as Internxt Drive serves as your full encrypted cloud storage vault.

Additional features such as VPN, Antivirus, Device Cleaner, NAS support, Meet, and Mail also offer you additional protection from hackers and data breaches as part of your cloud storage plan with Internxt.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard encryption, post-quantum encryption algorithms are built to resist powerful quantum attacks, making PQE a more secure alternative to Drime.
This cryptography method is used by Internxt to ensure that your lifetime cloud storage plan protects you against future cybersecurity threats and is available for all plans at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, making it a GDPR compliant cloud storage solution that follows strict laws to ensure your data and privacy are protected.

faq.question: Is Drime more expensive than Internxt?
answer: Drime costs €105 annually for 1TB of cloud storage. With Internxt, you can get 5TB of post-quantum encrypted storage, plus VPN, Antivirus, Meet, Mail, and more for €36 for the first year. With your exclusive {{percentage}}% discount, Internxt offers cloud storage and an extensive range of features not available with any other cloud provider, including Drime.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you have any more questions, requests, or need assistance, you can contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from the settings of your Internxt account if you need to add more storage. Or purchase a new plan at internxt.com/pricing with your current Internxt account, and your storage will be automatically stacked.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Yes, Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc). You can also pay via PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
